Lyric:
[by:yueer721]
[00:01.16]We don't talk anymore, we don't talk anymore
[00:05.58]We don't talk anymore, like we used to do
[00:10.53]We don't love anymore
[00:13.09]What was all of it for?
[00:15.39]Oh, we don't talk anymore, like we used to do
[00:20.10]I just heard you found the one you've been looking
[00:24.12]You've been looking for
[00:25.83]I wish I would have known that wasn't me
[00:29.65]Cause even after all this time I still wonder
[00:33.14]Why I can't move on
[00:35.70]Just the way you did so easily
[00:39.20]Don't wanna know
[00:41.58]What kind of dress you're wearing tonight
[00:44.15]If he's holding onto you so tight
[00:46.47]The way I did before
[00:48.78]I overdosed
[00:50.65]Should've known your love was a game
[00:53.72]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[00:56.14]Oh, it's such a shame
[00:59.19]We don't talk anymore, we don't talk anymore
[01:03.13]We don't talk anymore, like we used to do
[01:07.98]We don't love anymore
[01:10.43]What was all of it for?
[01:12.92]Oh, we don't talk anymore, like we used to do
[01:18.61]I just hope you're lying next to somebody
[01:21.29]Who knows how to love you like me
[01:23.66]There must be a good reason that you're gone
[01:27.25]Every now and then I think you
[01:30.83]Might want me to come show up at your door
[01:33.41]But I'm just too afraid that I'll be wrong
[01:36.99]Don't wanna know
[01:39.30]If you're looking into her eyes
[01:41.77]If she's holding onto you so tight the way I did before
[01:46.19]I overdosed
[01:48.08]Should've known your love was a game
[01:51.06]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[01:53.61]Oh, it's such a shame
[01:56.43]That we don't talk anymore (We don't, we don't)
[01:59.34]We don't talk anymore (We don't, we don't)
[02:01.23]We don't talk anymore, like we used to do

[02:39.27]If he's giving it to you just right
[02:41.69]The way I did before

[02:48.77]Now I can't get you out of my brain
[02:51.14]Oh, it's such a shame

[02:58.88]We don't talk anymore, like we used to do
